leukapp.apps.leukforms.constants module¶

This module contains the leukforms app constants. Information that isn’t likely to change and that is used across the leukforms app and the leukapp project should be stored here.

Important

DO NOT change any constant unless you know what you are doing.

APP_NAME = 'leukforms'¶

Application’s name.

CREATE_FIELDS = {'Aliquot': ('specimen', 'ext_id'), 'Specimen': ('individual', 'source', 'source_type', 'ext_id', 'order'), 'Individual': ('institution', 'species', 'ext_id'), 'Extraction': ('aliquot', 'platform', 'technology', 'center', 'ext_id', 'analyte', 'projects_string')}¶

Dictionary including create fields* for leukapp apps models.

LEUKAPP_FACTORIES = {'Aliquot': <class 'leukapp.apps.aliquots.factories.AliquotFactory'>, 'Specimen': <class 'leukapp.apps.specimens.factories.SpecimenFactory'>, 'Individual': <class 'leukapp.apps.individuals.factories.IndividualFactory'>, 'Project': <class 'leukapp.apps.projects.factories.ProjectFactory'>, 'Extraction': <class 'leukapp.apps.extractions.factories.ExtractionFactory'>}¶

Dictionary of model factories potentially used during a leukform submission.

LEUKAPP_FORMS = {'Aliquot': <class 'leukapp.apps.leukforms.forms.AliquotForm'>, 'Specimen': <class 'leukapp.apps.leukforms.forms.SpecimenForm'>, 'Individual': <class 'leukapp.apps.leukforms.forms.IndividualForm'>, 'Extraction': <class 'leukapp.apps.leukforms.forms.ExtractionForm'>}¶

Dictionary of model forms potentially used during a leukform submission.

LEUKAPP_MODELS = {'Aliquot': <class 'leukapp.apps.aliquots.models.Aliquot'>, 'Specimen': <class 'leukapp.apps.specimens.models.Specimen'>, 'Individual': <class 'leukapp.apps.individuals.models.Individual'>, 'Extraction': <class 'leukapp.apps.extractions.models.Extraction'>}¶

Dictionary of model classes potentially used during a leukform submission.

LEUKAPP_UNIQUE_TOGETHER = {'Aliquot': ('specimen', 'ext_id'), 'Specimen': ('individual', 'ext_id', 'source_type'), 'Individual': ('institution', 'species', 'ext_id'), 'Extraction': ()}¶

Dictionary including unique together fields* for leukapp apps models.

LEUKFORM_CREATE_FIELDS = ('description', 'submission', 'mock')¶

Fields required to create a new instance.

LEUKFORM_CREATE_PERMISSIONS = ('leukforms.add_leukform',)¶

Tuple of permissions required to create a new instance.

LEUKFORM_CREATE_URL = 'leukforms:create'¶

Create URL reverse string.

LEUKFORM_LIST_URL = 'leukforms:list'¶

List URL reverse string.

LEUKFORM_UNIQUE_TOGETHER = ('description', 'submission', 'mock')¶

Fields that are required to be unique together.

LEUKFORM_UPDATE_FIELDS = ('description',)¶

Enabled fields to update an existing instance.

LEUKFORM_UPDATE_PERMISSIONS = ('leukforms.change_leukform',)¶

Tuple of permissions required to update an existing instance.

MODELS_LIST = ['Individual', 'Specimen', 'Aliquot', 'Extraction']¶

List of models names potentially used during a leukform submission.

PERMISSION_DENIED_MESSAGE = " You don't have permission to perform this action, please contact a\n Leukgen Administrator. "¶

Permission denied message.

SUCCESS_MESSAGE = 'Looking good'¶

Sucess message.
